title: Boards Account Level doesn't update?
body: Level 30 in League, but the Boards hasn't updated to match. Is this how it works? I'm very confused by it.

replies.body: An account may need to sync to the boards when posting for the first time.  It looks like your account is now sync'd!  Let me know if you still have any issues posting.
No problems it seems, I can post in any chat. Thanks Porocles!
